description:
Trail is in CBHNP. The area at the end of the trail is where my family first settled when they came here in the 19th century.
It's designed as a backcountry hike that provides an over night opportunity. You need to reserve your campsite and permit with the wardon's office prior to staying in the area.
directions: CBHNP trail #9 (Cape Breton Highlands National Park)
title: Fishing Cove
